name: macx
title: MacX
description: Quick script execution extension for Hydrogen executor
author: YourName

commands.name: logs
commands.title: Logs
commands.subtitle: View Logs
commands.description: View the logs of the Hydrogen executor

commands.name: autoExecute
commands.title: Auto Execute
commands.subtitle: Auto Execute Scripts
commands.description: Auto execute scripts when they are added to the favorites

commands.name: editFastFlags
commands.title: Edit Fast Flags
commands.subtitle: Roblox Fast Flags Editor
commands.description: Edit Roblox client fast flags configuration

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
